Package app.core.domain.model

Class AgeGroup

java.lang.Object
app.core.domain.model.AgeGroup
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<AgeGroup>
public class AgeGroup extends Object implements Comparable<AgeGroup>, Serializable
It represents an age group through minimum age, maximum age, doses administered and a list of doses.
Author:
Group 40

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(AgeGroup otherAgeGroup)
      Compares the age group with the other age group received by parameter.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<AgeGroup>
      Parameters:
      otherAgeGroup - the age group to be compared.
      Returns:
      the value 0 if the received otherAgeGroup is equal to the age group; the value -1 if the otherAgeGroup is later than the age group; the value 1 if the otherAgeGroup is earlier than the age group.
